item.title: 收购谈判报道后，Grindr 创 15 个月来最大涨幅
item.description: 周一，Grindr Inc. 股价创下逾 15 个月以来的最大涨幅，此前 Semafor 报道称，这家专注于 LGBT 交友应用的公司内部人士正在讨论将其私有化。【原文：Grindr Inc. shares jumped the most in more than 15 months on Monday after Semafor reported that insiders at the LGBT-focused dating app company are discussing taking it private.】

item.title: 美联储主席保尔森支持 2025 年再削减两次关税
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长安娜-保尔森（Anna Paulson）表示，她赞成今年再降息四分之一点两次，因为货币政策应看清关税对消费者价格上涨的影响。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Anna Paulson signaled she favors two more quarter-point interest-rate cuts this year, as monetary policy should look through the impact of tariffs in consumer price increases.】

item.title: 军情五处警告英国政界人士注意中国和俄罗斯的间谍活动
item.description: 英国国内安全部门军情五处（MI5）警告政界人士及其工作人员，他们正成为来自中国、俄罗斯和伊朗间谍的目标，目的是破坏英国的民主制度。【原文：The UK’s domestic security service, MI5, warned politicians and their staff that they are being targeted by spies from China, Russia and Iran in efforts geared toward undermining British democracy.】

item.title: 贸易摩擦引发供应过剩忧虑，2026 年石油供不应求问题严重
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普最新的关税威胁加剧了市场对即将出现供应过剩的担忧，石油市场出现了看跌迹象。【原文：Bearish signs are cropping up across the oil market after US President Donald Trump’s latest tariff threats fanned fears of an imminent oversupply.】

item.title: 赞比亚与中国贷款机构签署协议，对部分贷款进行重组
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长西坦贝科-穆索科特瓦内（Situmbeko Musokotwane）表示，赞比亚已经签署了双边债务重组协议，涉及赞比亚对中国进出口银行等中国贷款机构的部分债务。【原文：Zambia has signed bilateral debt-restructuring deals covering some of its obligations to Chinese lenders, including the Export–Import Bank of China, Finance Minister Situmbeko Musokotwane said.】

item.title: ABB 与 Nvidia 合作开发下一代数据中心
item.description: ABB 有限公司将与 Nvidia 公司合作开发下一代人工智能数据中心。【原文：ABB Ltd. is set to develop next-generation AI data centers in collaboration with Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 空中客车公司在阿拉巴马州和中国开设工厂以提高 A320 产量
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）正在美国和中国为其最畅销的A320neo系列飞机增设装配线，因为该公司正努力在大量飞机积压的情况下将月产量提高到75架。【原文：Airbus SE is opening additional assembly lines in the US and China for its bestselling A320neo family as the company tries to reach production of 75 jets a month amid a massive backlog.】

item.title: 米其林因北美销售疲软而下调业绩展望
item.description: 米其林以经济疲软为由，下调了今年的财务指导，原因是北美地区的轮胎销售额降幅超过预期。【原文：Michelin lowered its financial guidance for the year after tire sales in North America fell more sharply than expected, with the tiremaker citing a weaker economy.】

item.title: 摩根大通将周五股市大跌归咎于杠杆 ETF
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A run for the exits by investors in levered exchange-traded funds on Friday exacerbated the largest single-day stock market selloff since April, according to strategists at JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 伦敦住宅建设有望降至正常水平的四分之一
item.description: 在销售量跌至 15 年来的最低点后，伦敦在建住宅的数量可能降至正常水平的四分之一。【原文：The number of homes under construction in London could slump to a quarter of its normal level after sales collapsed to a 15-year low.】

item.title: 花旗聘请两位伦敦银行家为私募股权投资退出提供建议
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）在伦敦聘用了两名投资银行家，以加强其为私募股权公司和其他出售资产的公司提供咨询的团队。【原文：Citigroup Inc. has hired two investment bankers in London to build out its team advising private equity firms and other companies selling assets.】

item.title: 华尔街为争夺收益率将更多自动赎回债券纳入 ETF
item.description: 让开，缓冲基金。忘掉那些提高收入的策略吧。杠杆？谁需要它。华尔街已经找到了另一种可用于 ETF 的衍生工具：单一股票自动赎回。【原文：Move over, buffer funds. Forget those income-enhanced strategies. Leverage? Who needs it. Wall Street has found another derivatives-powered bet to stuff inside an ETF: The single-stock autocallable.】

item.title: 苹果将于 10 月 17 日在中国开放 iPhone Air 预售
item.description: 苹果公司将把其超薄 iPhone Air 带到中国，在此之前，中国电信运营商曾暂停为这款仅限 eSIM 卡的设备做准备。【原文：Apple Inc. is bringing its superthin iPhone Air to China after a pause that allowed local carriers to prepare for the eSIM-only device.】

item.title: 贝克休斯首席执行官认为贸易关税将带来 1 亿美元损失
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战之际，贝克-休斯公司今年受到的关税影响已超过 1 亿美元，在该公司 4 月份预测的范围之内。【原文：Baker Hughes Co. has seen an impact of more than $100 million from tariffs this year, within the range that the company forecast in April as US President Donald Trump launched his trade war.】

item.title: 贝森特表示财政部将优先支付款项，这是不寻常的举动
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他的部门正在对系统中的资金流进行调整，以便美国军事人员能够拿到工资；而他的前任曾表示，这种做法可能无法实现。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent indicated his department is shuffling the flow of money through its system in order to allow for US military staff to get paid — a maneuver that his predecessor had suggested might not be possible.】

item.title: 华尔街为何对 EA 巨型收购案寄予厚望
item.description: 计划以 550 亿美元杠杆收购视频游戏制造商电子艺界公司（Electronic Arts Inc.【原文：The planned $55 billion leveraged buyout of video-game maker Electronic Arts Inc. is set to rain money on Wall Street, with banks in line to share roughly $500 million in fees for arranging the financing.】

item.title: 津巴布韦警告称，如果按计划放弃美元，经济将面临风险
item.description: 如果津巴布韦按计划到 2030 年在国内取消使用美元，将危及这个南部非洲国家目前难得的经济稳定。【原文：Zimbabwe will jeopardize the rare bout of economic stability the southern African nation is currently enjoying if it scraps the use of dollars domestically by 2030 as planned.】

item.title: 交易员撇清特朗普关税威胁，美元重拾涨势
item.description: 美元周一上涨，原因是货币交易商摆脱了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国征收高额关税的最新威胁，转而关注世界两大经济体之间可能达成贸易协议的途径。【原文：The dollar rose on Monday as currency traders shrugged off the latest threat of steep tariifs on China from US President Donald Trump and instead focused on the path for a possible trade deal between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 美国在部署高超音速武器方面落后了。为何重要
item.description: 高超音速武器速度极快，其速度可以改变周围的空气分子。它们可以携带核弹头，低空飞行，难以探测。由于高超音速武器具有改变现代战争的潜力，因此已成为美国与俄罗斯和中国之间日益激烈的军事主导权争夺战中的一条关键战线。【原文：Hypersonic weapons are so fast, their speed can change the surrounding air molecules. They can carry a nuclear warhead, fly low and be hard to detect. Because of their potential to transform modern warfare, these weapons have become a key front in the intensifying race for military dominance between the US on one side and Russia and China on the other.】

item.title: 尽管美国证券交易委员会采取了关闭措施，但大多数美国首次公开募股仍处于停滞状态
item.description: 在感恩节假期前，市场监管机构为那些希望在美国上市的公司提供了便利。顾问们说，修订后的指导意见所开辟的道路不可能让更多的公司上市。【原文：Companies looking to go public in the US before the Thanksgiving holiday seemingly got a boost when the market regulator made it easier for them to list as the government shutdown grinds on. Advisers say the path opened by the revised guidance isn’t likely to unlock more than a handful of listings.】

item.title: 挪威怀疑诺贝尔和平奖得主有间谍行为
item.description: 挪威官员认为，在今年诺贝尔和平奖揭晓之前，网络间谍活动很可能是导致今年诺贝尔和平奖获得者异常投注激增的原因。【原文：Norwegian officials see cyber espionage as the most likely cause of unusual betting surge on this year’s Nobel Peace Prize recipient ahead of the announcement.】

item.title: 科威特宣布在近海油田发现 "重大 "天然气发现
item.description: 科威特国有石油公司在欧佩克成员国近海地区的 Jazah 天然气田有了 "重大 "发现。【原文：State-owned Kuwait Oil Co. made a “major” discovery in the Jazah natural gas field in the OPEC member’s offshore region.】

item.title: 中西部和东部天气持续温暖，美国天然气价格下跌
item.description: 美国天然气期货下跌，原因是预测从得克萨斯州到缅因州的天气将比正常情况下温暖，这表明取暖燃料的需求减弱。【原文：US natural gas futures declined on forecasts for warmer-than-normal weather from Texas to Maine, signaling muted demand for the heating fuel.】

item.title: 法拉奇称英国在加密货币方面已经落后，需要尽快制定规则
item.description: 英国改革派领导人奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）表示，英国必须尽快对加密货币行业进行监管，以维护其作为国际金融中心的地位，并加倍支持数字资产。【原文：Reform UK leader Nigel Farage said the UK must regulate the crypto industry soon to safeguard its position as an international financial hub, doubling down on his support for digital assets.】

item.title: 丹格特称在象牙海岸开设价值 1.76 亿美元的水泥厂
item.description: 丹格特水泥公司（Dangote Cement Plc）在象牙海岸开设了一家工厂，象牙海岸是该地区经济增长最快的国家之一。【原文：Dangote Cement Plc has opened a plant in Ivory Coast, which has one of the fastest-growing economies in the region.】

item.title: 中国紧张局势缓解，博通与 OpenAI 达成协议，美股上涨
item.description: 周一，美国股市反弹，原因是唐纳德-特朗普总统收回了对中国征收关税的威胁，博通公司（Broadcom Inc.【原文：US stocks rebounded on Monday, as President Donald Trump dialed back his threats to impose tariffs on China and Broadcom Inc. signed a multi-year deal with OpenAI.】

item.title: 香港最著名的激进投资者关闭具有影响力的网站
item.description: 香港最著名的激进投资者大卫-韦伯（David Webb）即将关闭自己的网站。他于 1998 年创建了自己的网站，该网站是他数十年来努力推动提高香港金融市场透明度的关键所在。【原文：Hong Kong’s most famous activist investor David Webb is calling time on his website, which he founded in 1998 and was key to his decades-long efforts to push for greater transparency in the city’s financial markets.】

item.title: 风力不足，化石燃料激增，德国电价创 8 个月新高
item.description: 德国周二的电价跃升至二月份以来的最高水平，原因是低风力水平继续影响全国数千台风力涡轮机的运行，需要更昂贵的燃煤和燃气发电厂。【原文：German electricity prices for Tuesday jumped to their highest level since February as low wind levels continue to affect the nation’s thousands of wind turbines with more expensive coal and gas-fired plants needed.】

item.title: 阿联酋人工智能部长称马斯克的 Boring 公司将于明年开通 "迪拜环路
item.description: 据一位阿联酋官员称，迪拜的乘客最快明年就能乘坐埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的地下交通系统。【原文：Commuters in Dubai will be able to ride in Elon Musk’s underground transit system as soon as next year, according to an Emirati official.】

item.title: 加密货币最大暴跌揭示市场陷阱重重
item.description: 在上周五的几个小时里，被支持者称为金融未来的数字资产世界以机器的速度重演了华尔街在市场压力下最古老的反射：一窝蜂涌向出口。【原文：For a few manic hours on Friday, the world of digital assets — billed by proponents as the future of finance — replayed Wall Street’s oldest reflex at machine speed during market stress: a stampede for the exits.】
